'''"Courier's System of Sort and Dispatch"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Courier's System of Sort and Dispatch" is obtainable from a Remarkable Chest in [[Natlan]], should be noted the chest only appears after one does the first act of [[Where the Springs Return]] quest.

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in {{Location|Ameyalco Waters}} after defeating {{Enemy|Koholasaurus Warrior: Reefsplitter|x=2}}.
